title: New: A K U A – Nothing Compares 2 U (Prince / Sinéad O'Connor Cover)
body:
It’s not every day that you get to open for the future Princess of pop, aka Miss **Solange Knowles**, let alone impressing her so much that you get asked to sing back-up vocals for her.

Obviously, given my love for **A K U A**, I can’t say that I’m surprised with her recent success, and on the strength of her debut EP, it’s thoroughly deserved. On this new track, a cover of **Prince’s** _Nothing Compares 2 U_ (although most famously recorded by **Sinéad O’Connor**… before she went bat-shit crazy…). A notoriously difficult track to cover, **A K U A** more than does it justice, shining a modern, very current sound upon the single from 1990. Check it out below, record exclusively for [Rookie Mag](http://rookiemag.com/).
